Posts.EditableText: Im using the most recent Quest version 5 and I looked up the information on adding a library (I want to add journal and a score) but I am unsure about 'going down the tree' is that within the Quest editor or where its installed on the system. Has this changed in this version of Quest? Thanks!
Posts.HTML: Im using the most recent Quest version 5 and I looked up the information on adding a library (I want to add journal and a score) but I am unsure about 'going down the tree' is that within the Quest editor or where its installed on the system. Has this changed in this version of Quest? Thanks!

Posts.EditableText:
It'sreaaly easy. Just choose Advanced/Included Libraries and then add your library
[attachment=0:34x3udla]<!-- ia0 -->lib.jpg<!-- ia0 -->[/attachment:34x3udla]
Posts.HTML: It'sreaaly easy. Just choose Advanced/Included Libraries and then add your library

Posts.EditableText: I do not seem to have this directory available in the new Quest. Please see my screenshot attached, thank you!

Posts.EditableText: Ah, you are creating a gamebook. Libraries can only be used in text adventures
Posts.HTML: Ah, you are creating a gamebook. Libraries can only be used in text adventures
